actions.text: On agreeing to the Haaland amendment (A005) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 173 (Roll no. 203).
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Haaland.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Haaland amendment (A005) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 173 (Roll no. 203).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Haaland amendment (A005) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 235 - 173 (Roll no. 203).
Roll call votes on amendments in House

description: An amendment numbered 32, printed Part B of House Report 116-528 to increase authorizations for energy R&D accounts by 50% and add an authorization for total funding for research, development, demonstration and commercialization activities for EERE.
purpose: Amendment increases authorizations for energy R&D accounts by 50 percent and adds an authorization for total funding for research, development, demonstration and commercialization activities for EERE.
